subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Rick DiPietro turned aside 37 shots, and the Islanders snapped a four-game losing streak by defeating the Pittsburgh Penguins, 3-1, last night at Nassau Coliseum.
snippet: Rick DiPietro turned aside 37 shots, and the Islanders snapped a four-game losing streak by defeating the Pittsburgh Penguins, 3-1, last night at Nassau Coliseum.
